rule_name.description:
Description

Checks the number of parameters of a method or constructor.
rule_name.option:
ignoreAnnotatedBy, Ignore methods and constructors annotated with the specified annotation(s)., String[], {}
ignoreOverriddenMethods, Ignore number of parameters for methods with @Override annotation., boolean, false
max, Specify the maximum number of parameters allowed., int, 7
tokens, tokens to check, subset of tokens

METHOD_DEF
,
CTOR_DEF
